title: @ Riot did i just get trolled? or am i blind regards mystery gift from Riot.. :) ^^
body:
i was given a mystery gift for been a good bugga. i clicked ok but nothing showed up. does it like magicly appear or something?
ty

replies.body: Mystery Gifting history is a thing. Go to purchases and it will tell you.

You wouldve gotten a gift, same thing happen to me, i dcd as i opened and came back and it was gone.
i looked through my roughly 100+ skins and found that i now have slay belle katarina :)
